GSD.description:
scsi: mpt3sas: Fix use-after-free warning

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v4.9.328 by commit b8fc9e91b931215110ba824d1a2983c5f60b6f82. For more details please see the references link.
